sqlList.sql: select tlu.login_mobile AS TELPHONE,tlu.DEVICETOKEN from t_lm_user tlu where tlu.devicetoken IS NOT NULL

select ult.login_mobile AS TELPHONE, tlu.DEVICETOKEN from t_lm_usergroup up inner join t_lm_ugroup_ult ult on up.id = ult.usergroup_id inner join t_lm_user tlu on tlu.login_mobile = ult.login_mobile AND tlu.devicetoken IS NOT NULL inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:UserGroupList, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:UserGroupList) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:UserGroupList, ',', ''))) dt on up.id=dt.commlist
delete from freek_t_1 t where t.col4=:TaskID
select tlu.login_mobile AS TELPHONE, tlu.DEVICETOKEN from freek_t_1 ft inner join t_lm_user tlu on tlu.login_mobile = ft.col2 AND tlu.devicetoken IS NOT NULL where ft.col4=:TaskID
